function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $49.98 - $29.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:46:47 UTC – Details)


Are you ready for the next generation of awesome? Introducing Wyze Cam Pan v2, now with Color Night Vision! Say goodbye to losing sight when something moves outside the view of your camera. With its 110°/sec rotation speed, 360° horizontal range, and 93° vertical range, Wyze Cam Pan v2 delivers 360° coverage in under 3 seconds so you can see exactly what you want to see, when you want to see it. This camera is a favorite for busy households and pet owners.
Pan, tilt, and zoom: Control remotely using the Wyze app so you can see the whole room, fast. Or monitor a room automatically by setting 4 predefined waypoints. Panning has a 360° left/right rotation range and tilting has a 93° vertical up/down range.Controller Type:Google Assistant.Connectivity protocol:Wi-Fi.
Now with Color Night Vision: Record night time video in full, vivid color in environments up to 25x darker than traditional cameras.
Livestream from anywhere in full 1080p HD: See inside your home in real time using your mobile device.
Two-way audio: Speak with anyone you care about through the Wyze app.
Motion & Sound detection: Records video when motion & sound are detected and sends an alert to your phone.

360˚ of Coverage

See the entire room. Fast.

Smart Assistant Compatible

Use your voice to see what’s happening around your home.

Motion Tracking

Automatically detect, tag, and track motion in real-time.

Instant Security Alerts

Get notified whenever motion is detected. Customize notifications in the Wyze app.

Two-Way Audio

Listen and talk to anyone you care about while not at home.

Color Night Vision

Capture every story in color, even at night.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:46:47 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:58 UTC – Details)



SUPERCHARGED BY M2 — Get more done faster with a next-generation 8-core CPU, up to 10-core GPU and up to 24GB of unified memory.
UP TO 18 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE — Go all day and into the night, thanks to the power-efficient performance of the Apple M2 chip.
BIG, BEAUTIFUL DISPLAY — The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display features over 500 nits of brightness, P3 wide color and support for 1 billion colors for vibrant images and incredible detail.
ADVANCED CAMERA AND AUDIO — Look sharp and sound great with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, three-mic array and four-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.
VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY — MacBook Air features a MagSafe charging port, two Thunderbolt ports and a headphone jack.
EASY TO USE — Your Mac feels familiar from the moment you turn it on, and works seamlessly with all your Apple devices.

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4°F to 149°F -20°C to 65°C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22°F to 158°F -30°C to 70°C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85°, Bottom 85°, Left 80°, Right 80°
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications
Composite video input x2 (NTSC/PAL), Stereo audio input x1, VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1, USB input x1, RF x1, HDMI input x2, Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1, IR output x1, SPDIF output x1, Headphone output x1

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:44 UTC – Details)


When you hear the name Proscan, immediately you think of quality-built, high performance televisions at reasonable prices. The folks at Proscan have once again delivered on these core values with their all new, 40-Inch Full HD, 1080p LED TV with built in ATSC Tuner! Be the boss of your Television with provided full functioning remote control AND use one of the many inputs and outputs to connect your favorite device! This Tv features 1080P full high definition resolution, delivering the highest picture quality. HDMIx3, VGA, Audio/Video, PC Audio, Headphone, Coax and an RF Output! Perfect for your bed-room, den, living room or anywhere you want a great looking large screen TV! They’ve loaded up this ergonomic, wall mount ready television with every feature you need. The built in ATSC Tuner for instance, allows you to watch HD programming over the air without service fees! The brilliant screen is amazing from all angles.the sound quality will certainly impress your friends and family. Now it’s your opportunity to enjoy pure beauty. From the proud makers at Proscan, the leader in LED Televisions!
The television comes with a built in ATSC tuner. You won’t ever have to worry about paying for cable or satellite anymore. With the Proscan television set, you’ll be able to receive HD program for free over the airwaves
If you want to connect to an external device,’s fine too! The television set has several options to connect including HDMI, VGA, Audio/Video, PC Audio, Headphone, Coax, and an RF Output
The set is sleek in design as well. Not only does it perform well, but it looks good too! It’s ready to mount on the wall and you will be ready to watch in no time
The screen is easy to view at any angle and in the room will be able to watch. You’ll love watching your favorite shows, movies and sports events on your new Proscan set
Wattage: 65.0 watts

4.5
Price: $300.11
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Leotachi is a professional manufacturer of waterproof bathroom mirror TVs.

Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom

Screen Support 360° Rotation（New upgrade）Lock Screen Function（New upgrade）High-Speed Processor RK3288 (Smooth Operation）Touch Screen and IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Double Control)Automatic Defogging FunctionIP66 High-grade Waterproof

Upgraded mirror TV

Bright and Clear Screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and 500nits high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers(10w), Leotachi TV provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.

Luxury bathroom mirror tv

When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a Multifunctional TV and a luxury mirror at the same time.

Multipurpose mirror tv

Leotachi mirror TV has advanced performance, can support watching movies, listening to music, playing games, etc.,

Different Bathroom Mirror TV – 360° rotating

IP66 waterproof 1080P bathroom mirror TV system supports rotating the screen by 360°. We also recommend that you can choose a 360° rotating bracket (Available at Leotachi stores), and you can switch the angle and distance you want at will.

Multiple layers of materials are superimposed to make it waterproof and fog-proof

Package included:

When you receive the goods, please carefully confirm whether it is complete.

1 x 21.5inch Bathroom Mirror waterproof TV 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control(Need extra CR2025 battery)） 1 x Wall Bracket 1 x Installation Manual 1 x DC 12V Adapter

Professional Waterproof Level Mirror TV

A waterproof TV that is safe to use around humid environment. The TV is typically sealed in such a way that they can be splashed, rained on, submerged in water and other liquids and still function.

1. Waterproof Level : IP66 2. Overall size : 515(W)*312(H)*36(D)mm / 23.7 inch 3. Screen size: 476(W)-268(D)mm / 21.5 inch 4. Resolution: 1920*1080 5. Net Weight: 5.5KG 6. Working Temperature: -40 ~76°C 7. Power consumption : 60W (standby≤1W) 8. Speaker Power: 10w*2.

For Women

You can use Leotachi’ TV to watch your favorite movies or short videos.

For Men

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite competitions or news

For Kids

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite cartoons or play games

For Family

You can use Leotachi’TV to improve family harmony and get everyone in the family to love bathing!

IMPORTANT NOTICE

· Mirrors Damaged/Chipped on Arrival,No return needed.

· All you need to do is sending us photos.We will provide you with the most satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

· Please check the outer package while receiving, only accept whole package. And please check whether the mirror is intact.、

【Upgraded Smooth Touch Screen System】The mirror TV is a 10-point touch screen technology that supports a variety of gestures, you can also freely choose touch screen or remote control. The system uses a high-speed processor RK3288 – Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17 architecture to ensure smooth operation when using.
【Upgraded Brightness and Volume】Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V adapter, The brightness of 500cd/m2 is brighter than similar products on the market, bringing you different visual effects; in addition, the dual-speaker design allows you to hear clearly in noisy environments; better heat dissipation fast and prolong the service life of the product.
【Multifunctional luxury mirror】 When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a multifunction TV and a luxury mirror at the same time. Leotachi’s TV has a professional-grade IP66 waterproof rating, and the screen is automatically defogged without additional operation. especially suitable for some wet or extreme places, such as bathroom, shower, kitchen, swimming pool, yacht, sauna, spa, hot tub, steam room, etc.
【Installation and After Sales】 The Leotachi Bathroom TV comes with a wall mount bracket that can be easily installed in a wall recess or fixed to the wall by just one person. leotachi Bathroom TV is professionally certified and we offer a 1 year warranty. Please feel free to contact us for more details, all messages will be answered within 24 hours.

Product Description

HAOCROWN 32” FULL HD WITH 10-POINT MULTI-TOUCH CAPACITY SCREEN

In combination with the touch screen technology, you can easily browse through all the available options, choose your favorite programs, change the volume and turn the TV on and off with a simple touch of the TV screen. (Only suitable for use in HDMI2 channel)

The touch screen is very sensitive to slight and fast touch. Anti-scratch, not afraid of dust, water, and dirt, suitable for use in harsh environments.

The TV is being used in the shower area for easy accessibility and added safety. Don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity to showcase the latest spa technology and gain full control of your TV viewing experience.

Haocrown 32-inch Touch Screen IP66 Waterproof TV Smart Mirror for Bathroom LED TV Android 11.0 Full-HD Televions

MAIN INFORMATION OF 32 INCH TOUCH-SCREEN MIRROR BATHROOM TV IN HAOCROWN

LED display Size (diagonal): 32 inchesColor Options: MirrorBuilt-in the System (HDMI2 Channel): Android 11.0 (Quad-Core Processor)Control Type: Full Touch screen for 10 Point-Touch Control in smart system (HDMI2 channel)Brightness: 500 cd/m² (Ensure a great viewing experience in the bathroom that is usually well lit)Two installation Mode: Wall-mountable and Flush-mounted（Two Brackets are included in the Package）Speaker: Built-in two 8Ωx5W waterproof speakers / Or support Audio out available for external speakersTV Channel : HDTV,ATSC , Manual and automatic channel searchingDefault Language: English, Multi-lingual choiceRAM&ROM : 8G & 64G (Large memory makes the TV run smoothly and download more software)Resolution : 1920×1080 , 1080P FHD (you will have a clear picture and the image seems bright)Smart TV( HDMI2 Channel) Support: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Netflix, Youtube, etc.Support Multiple Modes：TV，HDMI1，HDMI2(Built-in Android 11.0 system, Support 10 Point-Touch Control），Media(USB2.0).

WHY PEOPLE WILL CHOOSE OUR HAOCROWN WATERPROOF BATHROOM TELEVISION?

WHY PEOPLE WILL CHOOSE OUR HAOCROWN WATERPROOF BATHROOM TELEVISION?

IP66 Triple Waterproof Protection

The whole TV housing passed IP66-Waterproof CertifiedWater-resistant, Dust-proof and Anti-fogSuitable for Humid and wet conditions

Luxury magic mirror design

Diamond-grade nano-silver mirror glassThe bathroom television is completely hidden in mirror.Full mirror when TV is off

2.4G/5.8G Wifi &BT 4.2

Stable, Fast 2.4G 5.8G WiFi signalBluetooth 4.2 ,Easily connect to bluetooth devices

Touch Smart Android 11.0 System

Full-Screen 10 Point Touch controlSimple Connect to Wi-Fi, easy access Netflix, YouTube..etc.

Image Feedback from our customers

Better tv than I expected

“”Great tv, i wired it directly to a speaker so I dont know if the sound quality is good, but through an external speaker its perfect.””

Impressive. Great mirror/TV for our bathroom.

“Impressed. When TV is off, looks like a normal mirror in our bathroom. Turn on the TV and the picture shows through really well. Running Android so easy to install apps. All good. Can watch from the bath with no problem. Comes with two ways to install (mounting cage or wall bracket). Good picture and sound. Overall pleased with this set.”

That it works well in the bathroom

“Would have been better if it swivelled but as it is in the bathroom it needs to be waterproof! But in every other respect it works very well and was just what was required!!”

Excellent Product

“Good product build quality, looks great in my bathroom.

Android portion is quite quick, and also can use on its own if you use a Chrome Cast and stream to the device. Adding a speaker definitely improves the sound which is quite ‘tinny’ out of the box.”

PACKAGE INCLUDE：

1 x 32-inch Touchscreen Smart Bathroom TV1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Need CR2025 battery）1 x Power Adapter and cord1 x Embedded Bracket with screws1 x On-Wall Bracket with screws1 x Installation Manual1 x HDMI Cable

(Kindly Note: The battery is not included.)

EASY TO INSTALL IN TWO MODES

On Wall-mounted:

Hole Spacing: VESA standard 200 x 200 mm

In Wall-mounted:

The Embedded Bracket Dimensions: 800 x 516 x 40mm/31.5″W x 20.3″H x 1.6″DThe Wall Hole Dimensions: 805 X 521 X 40 mm/31.7″W X 20.5″H X 1.6″D

Come included with a Wall-mount and Recess mounting Bracket in the Package

USB 3.0*1,LAN *1,HDMI input*1,Audio output *1,TV input*1,USB 2.0*1,DC 12V input*1

[IP66 100% Waterproof with safety]: Haocrown Waterproof TV is Built to the IP66-Certified Waterproof Standards, the whole machine with triple waterproof treatment, dustproof and anti-fog which can effectively prevent the damage of the TV from flushing. Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V, which design for humid Areas, Suitable for use in bathrooms, shower rooms, saunas, and spas etc. Let You Relax in the Bath and Tune in to Your Favourite TV Shows.
[2-in-1 Vanishing Mirror TV design]: Haocrown 32 inch smart TV is completely embedded within a luxury mirror. A mirror when turned off, but changes into a beautiful showpiece when you want it to. Power-on features enhanced brightness 500 LED screen to ensure excellent bright picture quality in usually well lit. It comes with endless possibilities. It is perfect for Bathrooms, offices, Gyms and many more locations, any space will come alive.
[Smart Android 11.0 System & HDTV Digital Tuner] Comes with the world’s most popular Android 11.0 operating system in HDMI2 channel.Haocrown Bathroom TV provides abundant content,Simply Connect to Wi-Fi or Lan, enjoy such as YouTube, Netflix,etc Entertainment essentials come pre-installed. 8 GB RAM, 64 GB Storage let you feel at ease to download more APP via the Google Play Store. Built-in ATSC tuner, supports digital HDTV programs.
【EASY TO INSTALL IN TWO MODES】：The Haocrown Waterproof TVs Come included with a Wall-mount and Recess mounting Bracket in the Package.Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 800 x 516 x 40mm/31.5″W x 20.3″H x 1.6″D. 【Support interfaces:】USB 3.0*1,LAN *1,HDMI input*1,Audio output *1,TV input*1,USB 2.0*1,DC 12V input*1【1 YEAR WARRANTY 】If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.We will respond within 24 hours.

Haocrown Smart Bathroom TV

From 5-star hotels to residential homes, Haocrown Bathroom TV’s have been the luxury bathroom TV of choice since 2012.

    There are several factors that increase the manufacturing costs.The main points are you safety and making the units waterproof.

    The units muse pass industry Highest IP66 waterproof standards which means great care needs to be taken when manufacturing.

    When the TV is turned OFF, can you see the screen outline within the mirror?

    No – it allowed the TV screen to be totally invisible when turned OFF,

    giving the appearance of a true mirror. Then when the TV is turned ON

    , the screen appears clearly within the mirror

Price: $299.00 - $255.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:56 UTC – Details)


1.SYLVOX 24-inch DC flat-screen TV, built-in DVD player, with a base, and high-resolution digital noise, suitable for RVs travel and home use.
2 .10.5V~28V full range wide voltage protection, which can effectively deal with the influence of unstable power supply voltage in the car on the TV when the RV starts and stops. Support DC voltage 12v/24v power supply, or use the attached adapter to connect to a home AC voltage 110v power supply.
With anti-reverse connection technology, when the positive and negative poles of the DC power supply are reversed, the TV will not be short-circuited, which effectively protects the TV.
3.Built-in dual 5W speaker cabinet , to provide high-quality sound. The square base bracket is earthquake-resistant . Designed for light motorhomes, caravans, motorhomes, boats, bedrooms, kitchens and home use
4 .HDMI and USB port for connection to USB or hard drive for recording and playback program file, or through the HDMI connection VAST box or media player. With a built-in DVD player, you can watch your favorite movies.
5. One-key scanning: Sylvox RV TV can be easily used in mobile environments such as boats and RVs . A simple function- SCAN is added to the remote control . When moving to a new location, just press the “Scan” button, and the TV will pass and retune to the new location and get all the channels in the new area.

We include a 100-240V adapter and a 12V cigarette lighter, so you can power it directly from a 12V socket, or you can power it throgh the adapter in the bedroom, kitchen.
The square base bracket has good shock resistance and can withstand bumps, potholes, and uneven roads.

Specification:
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 HD
Tuner: ATSC
Connection method: USB HDMI VGA
Voltage range: 10.5-28V DC
Aspect ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 220 cd/m2
Wall mount VESA : 100 x 100mm
Product size: 548.78*48.60*366.26mm
Standard: ATSC
Refresh rate: 60Hz
Power: 34w
Viewing angle: 178°H/178°V
Weight: 3.2Kg
Ports: EARPHONE, DC, HDMI, VGA, PC AUDIO, AV, YPBPR, AUDIO OUT, TV, COAX, USB
Accessories: remote control (including battery), power cable, adapter, square base, screws, manual, cigarette lighter.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.
Multiple Protection Design : Full HD TV support DC 12v/24v (DC wide voltage 10.5V-28V ) power supply, recoil protection (when the voltage changes sharply, it can become flat and will not damage the circuit), reverse connection protection (No short circuit even if the positive and negative terminals are reversed)
Excellent experience: 12 volt TV Built-in DVD, integrated ASTC tuner, with USB, HDMI, VGA port, cabinet speaker, minimal sound staining, reduced distortion, excellent broadband sound effect. 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle experience. With square bracket base, cigarette lighter, adapter and other accessories.
Use place: Travel and home Both, suitable for traveling campers with, trailers, RVs and home bedrooms, kitchens, lounges and other places of the perfect TV, through the included adapter to convert the home AC power to DC power to power the TV, thereby achieve home use effect.
Anti-seismic design, passed the 4G vibration test.6 pin DC port Anti-drop design, the plug is not easy to fall in the process of vibration.
High-definition TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 Full HD picture quality, full high definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and light weight body. High-performance 16 : 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8bit color panel with 16.7 million colors.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.

FEATURES OF 27 INCH TOUCH-SCREEN SMART MIRROR BATHROOM TV

  • Functions:  ATV/DTV/Monitor
  • Protection Grade:  IP66
  • Control type:  Touch screen for 10 Point-Touch Control
  • Speaker:  Built-in Waterproof Speaker
  • Remote Controller:  IP68 Waterproof
  • WiFi & Bluetooth:  Supported (Integrated) 
  • RAM+ROM:  4G+64G
  • Screen Size (Diagonal):  27″
  • Unit Size:  678 * 448 * 44mm / 26.69″W * 17.64″H * 1.73″D

  • Package Size:  780 * 550 * 140mm / 30.70″W * 21.65″H * 5.51″D

  • Finish:  Mirror
  • Front Panel Material:  Glass
  • Interface: TV / USBx2 / HDMIx1 / LAN /Audio Out /DC 12V

  • Brightness(Cd/m2): 500
  • Resolution: 1920×1080
  • Response Time:  6ms
  • Viewing Angle (H/V): 178/178(H/V)
  • Built-in Speakers: 2pcs
  • Standby Power: Under 1W
  • Power Consumption: 60W
  • Working Environment:  -30 to 50 degree
  • Working Humidity: 10%-90%
  • Install:  Recess Dimensions for in-wall (656 * 432 * 33mm/25.8″W * 17″H * 1.3″D), or Wall Bracket Dimensions for on-wall 27″(VESA100 * 100mm)
  • Accessories: Waterproof Controller(Without batteries)/Manual/ 100-240V Adapter/Power Cord/Wall Bracket/Embedded Back/Install tool.

【Awesome Configuration】27-inch screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers, which you can easily connect Wi-Fi and Bluetooth in HDMI 2 channel, high configuration RAM:4 GB, ROM:64 GB, built-in Android 11.0 system, HD screen provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.
【Use scene】As long as the switch of the display is turned off, it is a practical high-definition mirror. Smart mirror IP66 waterproof TV，Especially suitable for some humid or extreme places, such as bathrooms, washing room, show room kitchens, swimming pools, yachts, Sauna, salon, spa, hotel, hot tubs, steam rooms, etc. You can use Smart mirror display with your friends anytime, anywhere.
【Simple Installation】 “In-wall” and “On-wall” options : The waterproof bathroom TV can be fitted either built into the wall recess or secured to the wall itself. The waterproof TVs come included with a wall-mount and recess mounting bracket in the package. Easily to tightly fix the television to the desired spot. Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 656 x 432 x 33mm/25.8″W x 17″H x 1.3″D.
【Quality Guarantee】leotachi Smart mirror TV comes with 1-year-warranty. Please don’t hesitate to contact us for more details and all messages will be replied within 24 hours.
